de.iss.mv2.client.data

Class MV2ClientSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.data.Exportable

        • de.iss.mv2.client.data.MV2ClientSettings

  • public class MV2ClientSettings
extends de.iss.mv2.data.PropertiesExportable
    A store for default client settings.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
